message: This is a fair offer, Bob. Take it or we can play it out, but I think you'll regret it in the long run.
You're not as generous as you think you are, Alice. Time to make a real offer.
Let's split it down the middle, Bob. This is the fairest way forward.  We can keep going, but inflation will eat away at both our shares.
You think splitting it down the middle is fair? I think I deserve more, especially considering the risks I'm taking.
